name: filter-kinesis-stream
author: AWS Solutions
description: Filters messages from the Kinesis Stream for storage in the real-time dashboard DynamoDB table

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:tsc && npm prune --production && rsync -avrq ./node_modules ./dist
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -q -r9 ./package.zip * && cd ..
